text: {{Infobox Pro hockey team | current = 2014–15 Växjö Lakers HC season | text_color = #FFFFFF | bg_color = #F07F0F | team = Växjö Lakers HC | logo = | logosize = 150px | city = Växjö, Sweden | league = SHL | conference = | division = | founded = 1997 | arena = Vida Arena | uniform = | colors = Blue, orange, white | owner = | GM = Henrik Evertsson | coach = Sam Hallam | captain = Johan Markusson | name1 = | dates1 = | name2 = | dates2 = | le_mat_trophies = 2015, 2018, 2021 }} The Växjö Lakers HC is an ice hockey club in the town of Växjö in Sweden. It was established in 1997. The club won the Swedish national championship in 2015, 2018 and 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Ice hockey teams in Sweden Category:Växjö Category:1997 establishments in Sweden
